artist: Artist: Julia Halibut; Publisher: Chain Saw Media, St. Louis
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of a seated figure on the side of the road, across from whom there is a van pulled over and two other figures--silhouettes--loitering around a tree on a hill; 39 pp.
title: Stories for the Children! Volume 2
